attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 11/11/2008 is the 90th anniversary of the end of the Great War. Make 11/11/2008 a holiday and use this day to 1. Remember and honour the sacrifice made by our servicemen and women who gave their lives for our freedom. 2. Commemorate the service of all those who have served and continue to serve in the military and civil services.
